title: Paths to progress
brief_description: In Chiang Mai, the capital of Thailand, the Australian Development Assistance Bureau is working with the University’s Faculty of Agriculture in a highland Ergonomie project to help develop agricultural potential for some 80% of the Thai population living in small villages.
